table.name: basket_constituents
table.remarks: Constituent reference entities for basket instruments

column.name: weight
column.remarks: Notional weight; NULL means equal weighting

column.name: recovery_override
column.remarks: Override default recovery rate; NULL uses issuer default

checkConstraint.constraint: (((seniority IS NULL) OR ((seniority)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['SR_UNSEC'::character varying, 'SR_SEC'::character varying, 'SUBORD'::character varying])::text[]))))
checkConstraint.name: basket_constituents_seniority_check

table.name: basket_definitions
table.remarks: Basket credit derivative definitions (First-to-Default, N-th-to-Default, Tranche)

column.name: type
column.remarks: Basket type: FIRST_TO_DEFAULT, NTH_TO_DEFAULT, TRANCHETTE

column.name: nth
column.remarks: For N-th-to-Default: which default triggers (1=first, 2=second, etc.)

column.name: attachment_point
column.remarks: For tranches: lower bound of loss slice (0-1)

column.name: detachment_point
column.remarks: For tranches: upper bound of loss slice (0-1)

checkConstraint.constraint: (((((type)::text = 'NTH_TO_DEFAULT'::text) AND (nth IS NOT NULL) AND (nth >= 1)) OR ((type)::text <> 'NTH_TO_DEFAULT'::text)))
checkConstraint.name: basket_definitions_check

checkConstraint.constraint: (((((type)::text = 'TRANCHETTE'::text) AND (attachment_point IS NOT NULL) AND (detachment_point IS NOT NULL) AND (attachment_point >= (0)::numeric) AND (attachment_point < detachment_point) AND (detachment_point <= (1)::numeric)) OR ((type)::text <> 'TRANCHETTE'::text)))
checkConstraint.name: basket_definitions_check1

table.name: basket_portfolio_constituents
table.remarks: Maps basket derivatives to portfolios for multi-asset credit portfolios

column.name: weight_type
column.remarks: How the basket is weighted in the portfolio: EQUAL, NOTIONAL, or MARKET_VALUE

column.name: weight_value
column.remarks: Weight value corresponding to the weight_type

column.name: active
column.remarks: Whether this basket is currently active in the portfolio

table.name: bond_portfolio_constituents
table.remarks: Maps bonds to portfolios for multi-asset credit portfolios

column.name: weight_type
column.remarks: How the bond is weighted in the portfolio: EQUAL, NOTIONAL, or MARKET_VALUE

column.name: weight_value
column.remarks: Weight value corresponding to the weight_type

column.name: active
column.remarks: Whether this bond is currently active in the portfolio

checkConstraint.constraint: (((action)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['CREATE'::character varying, 'UPDATE'::character varying, 'DELETE'::character varying, 'TRANSITION'::character varying, 'CALCULATE'::character varying, 'NOVATION'::character varying])::text[])))
checkConstraint.name: ck_action

checkConstraint.constraint: (((entity_type)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['CREDIT_EVENT'::character varying, 'CASH_SETTLEMENT'::character varying, 'PHYSICAL_SETTLEMENT'::character varying, 'TRADE'::character varying, 'SIMM_CALCULATION'::character varying, 'SACCR_CALCULATION'::character varying])::text[])))
checkConstraint.name: ck_entity_type

checkConstraint.constraint: (((event_type)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['BANKRUPTCY'::character varying, 'FAILURE_TO_PAY'::character varying, 'RESTRUCTURING'::character varying, 'OBLIGATION_DEFAULT'::character varying, 'REPUDIATION_MORATORIUM'::character varying, 'PAYOUT'::character varying])::text[])))
checkConstraint.name: ck_event_type

column.name: recovery_rate
column.remarks: Recovery rate as a percentage (0-100). Default is 40% for senior unsecured corporate debt.

column.name: obligation_id
column.remarks: Optional reference to a specific bond (obligation) from the reference entity issuer

column.name: settlement_type
column.remarks: Settlement method for credit events: CASH or PHYSICAL

checkConstraint.constraint: (((trade_status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['PENDING'::character varying, 'ACTIVE'::character varying, 'CREDIT_EVENT_RECORDED'::character varying, 'TRIGGERED'::character varying, 'SETTLED_CASH'::character varying, 'SETTLED_PHYSICAL'::character varying, 'CANCELLED'::character varying, 'PARTIALLY_TERMINATED'::character varying, 'NOVATED'::character varying, 'TERMINATED'::character varying, 'COMPRESSED'::character varying])::text[])))
checkConstraint.name: chk_trade_status_values

table.name: crif_sensitivities
table.remarks: CRIF (Common Risk Interchange Format) sensitivity records for SIMM calculations

column.name: upload_id
column.remarks: Reference to the CRIF upload batch

column.name: product_class
column.remarks: SIMM product class: RatesFX, Credit, Equity, Commodity

column.name: risk_type
column.remarks: Specific risk type (e.g., Risk_IRCurve, Risk_CreditQ)

column.name: risk_class
column.remarks: High-level risk class: IR, FX, EQ, CO, CR_Q, CR_NQ

column.name: bucket
column.remarks: SIMM bucket for correlation purposes

column.name: label1
column.remarks: First risk factor label (e.g., Currency, Index Name)

column.name: label2
column.remarks: Second risk factor label (e.g., Tenor, Sub-curve)

column.name: amount_base_currency
column.remarks: Sensitivity amount in base currency

column.name: amount_usd
column.remarks: Sensitivity amount converted to USD

table.name: crif_uploads
table.remarks: Tracks CRIF (Common Risk Interchange Format) file uploads for SIMM calculations

column.name: upload_id
column.remarks: Unique identifier for the upload

column.name: filename
column.remarks: Name of the uploaded CRIF file

column.name: portfolio_id
column.remarks: Portfolio identifier from the CRIF file

column.name: valuation_date
column.remarks: Valuation date for the sensitivity data

column.name: currency
column.remarks: Base currency for the sensitivity amounts

column.name: total_records
column.remarks: Total number of sensitivity records in the upload

column.name: valid_records
column.remarks: Number of successfully processed records

column.name: error_records
column.remarks: Number of records with processing errors

column.name: processing_status
column.remarks: Processing status: PENDING, PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED

column.name: position_type
column.remarks: Position type as VARCHAR for JPA compatibility

column.name: statement_format
column.remarks: Statement format as VARCHAR for JPA compatibility

column.name: status
column.remarks: Statement status as VARCHAR for JPA compatibility

column.name: variation_margin
column.remarks: Daily variation margin amount - positive means payment required, negative means payment received

column.name: initial_margin
column.remarks: Required initial margin amount for positions covered by this statement

column.name: base_currency
column.remarks: Base currency for SA-CCR exposure calculation (jurisdiction-specific)

table.name: simm_bucket_mappings
table.remarks: SIMM bucket assignments for risk factors

column.name: risk_class
column.remarks: Risk class: IR, FX, EQ, CO, CR_Q, CR_NQ

column.name: risk_factor
column.remarks: Specific risk factor (e.g., currency, index name)

column.name: bucket
column.remarks: Assigned SIMM bucket

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the risk factor

table.name: simm_calculation_audit
table.remarks: Audit trail for SIMM calculation steps

column.name: step_name
column.remarks: Name of the calculation step

column.name: step_order
column.remarks: Sequential order of the step

column.name: input_data
column.remarks: JSON input data for the step

column.name: output_data
column.remarks: JSON output data from the step

column.name: calculation_details
column.remarks: Detailed calculation methodology

table.name: simm_calculation_results
table.remarks: Detailed SIMM margin components by risk class and bucket

column.name: risk_class
column.remarks: Risk class: IR, FX, EQ, CO, CR_Q, CR_NQ

column.name: weighted_sensitivity
column.remarks: Risk-weighted sensitivity amount

column.name: correlation_adjustment
column.remarks: Correlation-adjusted amount

column.name: margin_component
column.remarks: Margin contribution in reporting currency

table.name: simm_calculations
table.remarks: SIMM Initial Margin calculation requests and results

column.name: calculation_id
column.remarks: Unique identifier for the calculation

column.name: calculation_status
column.remarks: Status: PENDING, PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED

column.name: total_im
column.remarks: Total initial margin in reporting currency

column.name: diversification_benefit
column.remarks: Cross-risk class diversification benefit

table.name: simm_correlations
table.remarks: SIMM correlation coefficients for risk aggregation

column.name: risk_class
column.remarks: Risk class: IR, FX, EQ, CO, CR_Q, CR_NQ

column.name: correlation_type
column.remarks: Type: WITHIN_BUCKET or CROSS_BUCKET

column.name: bucket_from
column.remarks: Source bucket for cross-bucket correlations

column.name: bucket_to
column.remarks: Target bucket for cross-bucket correlations

column.name: correlation
column.remarks: Correlation coefficient (-1 to 1)

table.name: simm_parameter_sets
table.remarks: ISDA SIMM parameter set versions for IM calculations - Default SIMM 2.6 inserted

column.name: version_name
column.remarks: Friendly version name

column.name: isda_version
column.remarks: ISDA SIMM version (e.g., 2.6, 2.7)

column.name: effective_date
column.remarks: Date from which this parameter set is effective

column.name: end_date
column.remarks: Date until which this parameter set is effective

column.name: is_active
column.remarks: Whether this is the currently active parameter set

table.name: simm_risk_weights
table.remarks: SIMM risk weights for sensitivity weighting

column.name: risk_class
column.remarks: Risk class: IR, FX, EQ, CO, CR_Q, CR_NQ

column.name: bucket
column.remarks: SIMM bucket identifier

column.name: risk_weight
column.remarks: Risk weight factor for the bucket

checkConstraint.constraint: (((status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['QUEUED'::character varying, 'RUNNING'::character varying, 'COMPLETE'::character varying, 'FAILED'::character varying, 'CANCELED'::character varying])::text[])))
checkConstraint.name: simulation_runs_status_check
